name: Puma Punku
details: Found in western Bolivia, South America. The structures look to have been destroyed in a cataclysmic episode.

name: Saksaywaman
details: Found in Peru. This site has massive polygonal stones stacked on top of one another.

name: Ollantaytambo
details: Another complex found in Peru; this site has perfectly-cut stones from a very hard material.

name: Cross Temple
details: This site is found in Ethiopia. The temple was cut straight into the ground on a hill-side.

name: Petra
details: Found in Jordan; this amazing site has massive carvings of Roman-style buildings.

name: Nubian Pyramids
details: These pyramids are unique in their style. Situated in the deserts of Nubia, this site has some of the most interesting pyramids known to moden-day archeologists.

name: Kailasa Temple
details: Found in Ellora, India. This temple complex is carved straight into a mountain-side and has a large hand-carved cave-system.

name: Gunung Padang
details: This site is found in Indonesia. The site looks to haven been destroyed by a cataclysmic episode.

name: Angkor Wat
details: Found in Cambodia, Angkor Wat is a significant site to archeologists for its amazing precision in stone-cutting and and measurements.

name: Chichen Itza
details: This site is found in Mexico. There are large pyramids and columns that have been cut with extreme precision.

name: Baalbek
details: Found in Lebanon, this complex has massive stone-cuts that were done with extreme precision.

name: GÃ¶bekli Tepe
details: This site was found buried in Turkey and is estimated to be one of the oldest megalithic sites. The large columns detail a story about a cosmic impact by showing the constellations and possibly where a comet/meteor came from.
